screeningSummary: Trucker with dashcam footage of triangular object pacing his truck for two miles

textVariants.text: You're on the air. What's your story?
Alright, you're on. What's this about?
YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Finally, someone with a good story - tell us everything!
You're on. Look, I've heard a lot of stories tonight - why should I believe yours?
You're on. So what'd you see?
Oh good, a caller! What've you got for us tonight?
You're on the air. Start with the basic facts.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Twenty-two years driving trucks, Vern. Last night, I'm on Route 9 past the county line, maybe two hours into my shift, and I see this light. Not a plane. Not a drone. Just... hovering. Pacing my truck.

textVariants.text: Pacing your truck. How long did this go on?
Pacing your truck... okay, how long?
Pacing your TRUCK?! That's incredible! How long did this go on?!
Pacing your truck. Of course it was. How long?
Pacing your truck. Fine, I'll hear you out. How long?
Pacing your truck! That's amazing! How long did it keep that up?
Pacing your truck at highway speed. What was the duration?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Two miles, Vern. Two miles at my exact speed. I'm doing fifty-five, this thing is doing fifty-five. Triangular, three lights at each point, dead silent. I know aircraft. I see them every night on these highways. This wasn't anything I've ever seen.

textVariants.text: Two miles at your speed. What happened after that?
Two miles... alright. And then?
TWO MILES?! That's unreal! What happened next?!
Two miles at fifty-five miles an hour. Let me guess - it vanished?
Two miles. That's not nothing. What'd it do?
TWO MILES of pacing! This is incredible! What happened at the end?!
Two miles matching your speed, triangular configuration. What was the behavior at the conclusion of this encounter?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: It just... accelerated. Straight up. Gone in two seconds. I watched it on my dash cam when I stopped. Clear as day. I've been staring at that footage for six hours now, trying to figure out what I'm looking at.

textVariants.text: I've got to ask - could this be military testing? There's a lot of black projects out there.
Look, it could be military stuff, you know how it is out there...
STRAIGHT UP?! Gone in TWO SECONDS?! This is AMAZING! Military tech, maybe?
Of course it accelerated straight up. You know, there's military training out there...
Could be military tests. That's my guess anyway. What's your take?
Straight up into the sky! Gone in two seconds! This is PERFECT! Military, you think?
Vertical acceleration to escape velocity. What are your thoughts on potential origin - military, experimental aircraft, or something else?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: I thought the same thing, okay? I've been running through every explanation. But Vern, I've been driving these routes for twenty-two years. I know what military aircraft looks like. This broke every expectation I had about what aircraft can do.

textVariants.text: Send that footage in. Our team will tear it apart and if it's real, you're going to be part of something big. Appreciate you calling in.
Yeah, send the footage in. Someone should look at it. Thanks for calling.
Send us that footage! Our team is going to FREAK OUT over this! You're part of something HUGE!
Right, well... send the footage in if you want. We'll take a look. Next caller.
Send the footage in. We'll check it out. Thanks for calling.
Send us that DASH CAM FOOTAGE! This is exactly why we do this show! You're amazing!
Please send that footage to our research team. We will analyze every frame for anomalies, propulsion signatures, and corroborating evidence. Thank you for coming forward.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Will do, Vern. Thanks for... thanks for not laughing. It means a lot.

arcNotes: Trucker with dashcam evidence, skeptical but has specific details, willing to defend his experience
